description: Try our easy to follow Lamb Steaks With Pineapple Salsa recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Lamb Steaks With Pineapple Salsa Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 3 cup long grain white rice, steamed (to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: Heat 1 tbs oil in a large frying pan over medium heat. Add mustard seeds and stir-fry for 30 seconds until fragrant and starting to pop. Add pineapple, chilli and sugar and cook for 2 minutes. Transfer to a bowl. Wipe out pan.
Heat remaining oil in the same pan over high heat. Season lamb with salt and pepper. Cook lamb, in batches, for 3-4 minutes each side or until well browned and cooked to your taste.
Meanwhile, stir lime juice into pineapple salsa. Place lamb on a bed of steamed rice, top with salsa and serve with broccolini.
